hook.content: Bold claim or live demo start

projects.name: DAOGenie
projects.one_liner: Turn community decisions into real-world actions with AI agents
projects.problem: Traditional DAOs only handle digital transactions
projects.solution: AI agents executing real-world tasks based on governance votes

projects.name: Zubernetes
projects.one_liner: First TEE ZK container orchestrator for verifiable execution
projects.problem: Need secure containerized workloads with ZK verification
projects.solution: Intel SGX enclaves + ZK proof verification + Phala Dstack

projects.name: Priv8
projects.one_liner: Decentralized private social network - Reddit with privacy
projects.problem: Existing social platforms lack privacy features
projects.solution: Token-gated communities using Lit Protocol encryption

projects.name: FHEmix
projects.one_liner: FHE-powered crosschain crypto mixer for anonymity
projects.problem: FHE networks can't privately handle native assets
projects.solution: Mixer-exchange wrapping native assets into encrypted assets

projects.name: MaskD
projects.one_liner: ZKP protocol for obfuscating wallet address from spendings
projects.problem: Wallet addresses can be tracked, revealing spending patterns
projects.solution: Dark pool aggregating payments with ZK verification

projects.name: zkFlex
projects.one_liner: Verify Ethereum asset ownership without revealing wallet address
projects.problem: Users risk exposing wallet info when proving ownership
projects.solution: ZK-SNARK proofs confirming ownership without disclosure

projects.name: 1shield
projects.one_liner: Private transactions within DeFi apps using Railgun
projects.problem: Open blockchain transactions expose business data
projects.solution: Railgun integration concealing swap/loan/payment details

projects.name: StealthMail
projects.one_liner: Untraceable encrypted emails through stealth addresses
projects.problem: Data breaches in digital communications
projects.solution: Stealth address technology for anonymous email

projects.name: ZK Governance
projects.one_liner: Anonymous governance voting with humanness verification
projects.problem: Voting participants need privacy while proving participation
projects.solution: Worldcoin + Semaphore for anonymous verified voting

projects.name: Zkcord
projects.one_liner: Private NFT ownership verification for Discord
projects.problem: NFT-gated communities need privacy-preserving verification
projects.solution: ZK proofs + Merkle trees for ownership without wallet exposure

projects.name: Privacy Avengers
projects.one_liner: Verifiable machine unlearning for AI privacy
projects.problem: AI users can't detect privacy compromises or remove data
projects.solution: Backdoor attack verification + ML unlearning + ZK proofs

projects.name: visibleDarkBox
projects.one_liner: On-chain secure password for NFT-based account recovery
projects.problem: Private key management creates theft/loss risks
projects.solution: 2-of-3 secret sharing with ERC-6551 and Merkle trees

projects.name: RugStop
projects.one_liner: Time-locked liquidity to prevent rug pulls
projects.problem: Meme coin liquidity providers have no protection
projects.solution: Uniswap V4 hook with time-locked LP provisions

projects.name: Bob the Solver
projects.one_liner: Intent-based transactions for better wallet UX
projects.problem: Complex multi-step blockchain transactions
projects.solution: ML intent classification + AA wallet + automatic execution

projects.name: Croissant Protocol
projects.one_liner: Yield generation for future payments using Maker/sDAI
projects.problem: DAOs/users need yield while saving for future expenses
projects.solution: Maker Conduits + sDAI + EigenLayer integration

projects.name: DeFi Guardian
projects.one_liner: Smart contract security with rate limiting to prevent hacks
projects.problem: No proactive mechanism to detect/prevent large token theft
projects.solution: Proxy monitoring token flows, rate-limiting suspicious outflows

projects.name: Luban the Paymaster
projects.one_liner: Hold assets on one chain, sponsor gas on all chains
projects.problem: Need token balances on multiple chains for gas
projects.solution: Cross-chain sponsorship via AccountEscrow + CrosschainPaymaster

projects.name: Zook
projects.one_liner: Payment channels with yield generation
projects.problem: High gas fees, no incentive for payment channel funds
projects.solution: Batch settlement + Spark/MakerDAO yield + EAS attestations

projects.name: ZK Vendor Credentialing
projects.one_liner: ZK credential verification for healthcare workers
projects.problem: Redundant credentialing uploads to multiple hospital systems
projects.solution: Share only needed info via ZK proofs, off-chain Merkle trees

projects.name: Confide.id
projects.one_liner: Decentralized trust network based on human relationships
projects.problem: Establishing digital trust without centralized authorities
projects.solution: Peer-to-peer trust declarations with transitive trust

projects.name: Shin Protocol
projects.one_liner: Prove human credibility on-chain without losing anonymity
projects.problem: Decentralized identity verification with privacy
projects.solution: Trust score through completing decentralized quests

projects.name: ZK TicTacToe
projects.one_liner: Tic-Tac-Toe on Aleo with all game state in ZK
projects.problem: No accessible examples of ZK in web games
projects.solution: Leo programs as backend, React frontend, ZK-verified state

projects.name: Chameleon
projects.one_liner: AI text-to-image NFT generation
projects.problem: NFT creation requires artistic skills
projects.solution: Stable Diffusion + ControlNet for prompt-based NFT minting

projects.name: Widget Protocol
projects.one_liner: iPhone widgets for dApps
projects.problem: DApp developers face user retention challenges
projects.solution: Customizable iOS widgets for blockchain interactions

projects.name: zk-checkpoint
projects.one_liner: ZK proofs for Polygon PoS settlement to save gas
projects.problem: Settlement costs $250+ due to 105 validator signatures
projects.solution: ZK proof of >2/3 validator majority reduces L1 gas 86%
